item.title: NRSfM and SfT
item.description: Source: Lamarca 2019 DefSLAM In literature, non-rigid monocular scenes are handled by NRSfM and SfT NRSfM (non-rigid structure from motion) batch processing of images to recover deformation computationally demanding — slower than SFT SFT (shape from template) uses only a single image — faster than NRFfM lower computational cost must have a known 3D template (textured model)
